CABINET ENCLOSURES AND COOLING TECHNOLOGY

Modernize Data Centers, Increase Efficiency,
and Deploy at the Edge

SCALABLE S-SERIES CABINETS

Utilizing patented liquid-air hybrid cooling technology, S-Series Cabinets combine the efficiency of liquid-cooling, with the risk-free flexibility of air. These enclosures can reduce the cost of new data center construction, can be added to an existing data center deployment, or can be installed as a stand-alone solution, in any quantity, in almost any location.

  • Dynamic Density Control®
  • 40U, 45U, or 60U
  • Air Cooled Up to 85kW Per Cabinet
  • Precision Temp Control <2° Variance
  • Industry Leading PUE as Low as 1.15
  • Surgical Airflow/CFM Control of 8,000 CFM+
  • Managed Risk with No Liquid in IT Space
  • Noise Reduction to Meet OSHA Standards
  • Integrated Fire Suppression
  • Supports 45°F–80°F Water Supply
  • DCIM Monitoring & Management
  • Closed-Loop Design Eliminates Water Demand

RUGGEDIZED R-SERIES EDGE ENCLOSURES

When proximity counts, R-Series Enclosures are designed to take you to the very edge. With a variety of size and density configurations, these ruggedized enclosures combine data center space, cooling, security, monitoring, and mobility in ready-to-deploy form factors. Not to be confused with simple weather-proof IT cabinets, R-Series systems include vibration isolation, precision environmental control, positive-pressure systems, integrated security, fire suppression, and remote management and monitoring.

  • Dynamic Density Control®
  • 12U, 24U, 30U, 42U
  • Up to 1.5kW per Rack Unit
  • Integrated DX or Split System Cooling
  • Precision Temperature Control
  • Positive Airflow / Pressure System
  • Efficiency Management Functions
  • Vibration Isolation Features
  • NEMA 4 & NEMA 4X Ratings
  • Integrated Fire Suppression
  • Remote Monitoring & Management
  • Mobility Options of Casters, Pallet Jack, Self-Propelled

Improving Efficiency & Supporting Higher Density Has Become a Necessity

With IT density ranging from 2kW to 100kW per cabinet, new solutions are required. Liquid and immersion cooling have merits, but many of these highly specialized products don’t scale well, often slow down business agility and time-to-market, not to mention, they often limit the vendors and hardware suppliers with whom you can work with.

Don’t get caught up in the hype!  DDC’s Liquid-Air Hybrid cabinets can be deployed anywhere to support maximum density, for any hardware configuration, with exceptional energy efficiency, all without introducing any of these challenging tradeoffs.

Liquid Cooling & Immersion Cooling Trade Offs :

  • Not All Hardware is Supported
  • High Short-Term  and Long-Term Cost
  • Decreased Business Agility
  • Limited Hardware Vendor Choice
  • Difficult to Scale
  • Risk of IT Hardware Damage

WHY CHOOSE DDC CABINET TECHNOLOGY

Best-in-Class Energy Efficiency

Dynamic resource management, focused cooling, precision airflow, and granular data management eliminate energy waste.

Deploy ANY Hardware & Density

No customization, no restrictions, no density limitation, no extra risk.  Choose ANY rack-mountable hardware, and DDC does the rest.

Security, Risk Mitigation, Monitoring

With biometric security, built-in fire suppression, and advanced DCIM management tools, DDC lowers costs, while delivering more!

Scalability

Deploy 1 or 1000s without a loss of efficiency.  From data center platforms to single edge enclosures, DDC scales with your demand.

Deploy In ANY Environment

With DDC, the data center is anywhere you want it to be—raised floors, concrete slabs, warehouses, on ships, outside , anywhere.

DDC Pays for Itself

Utilizing < 50% of the power of a Chilled Door, but providing complete data center functionality, DDC lowers OpEx drastically!
